Text: ENAESA LM Turbine Transfer Cc I would like to organize a sort of kickoff meeting of this group to briefly outline obligations and other terms conditions that would need to be included in an ENAESA commercial agreement and discuss steps that we need to take in the ENA WestLB facility to handle funding of some equipment configuration changesadditions that ESA would like for the earmarked machines I was hoping to find a time either Thursday tomorrow afternoon or Friday afternoon please let me know which time slots on these afternoons would not work for you and if you think that there are other individuals that would be essential to this meeting Thankyou Kevin Joyce x

Electrobolt SS Scope Cc Attached is the LM and options scope that ESA has prepared that will be input to our MOU It does not reflect the scope of equipment that will be procured from ABB yet this should be forthcoming Also below is the current cost estimate of the machines with their SS options and the ABB scope Please let us know what other information regarding scope that you might need Thanks Kevin Forwarded by Kevin JoyceCorpEnron on AM From John R Ayres on PM To Chris BoothENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Brett R nron Kevin nron Glauco nron Gerald L nron Subject Total Electrobolt SS Scope Chris attached is the total scope to SS From this list you should be able to make your change order to SS base on purchased quantities versus required quantities I have provided you the required quantities I provided you a column for the delta cost to SS When you are finished please complete the spreadsheet for all of our records I do not know how we are to add cost for storage either Thanks John From John R Ayres on PM To Kevin nron cc Brett R nron Subject SS GE Scope of Supply Cost Here are the total cost for the SS scope of supply for the Electrobolt Project I have not included any ENA burdens or storage cost These cost are from purchase order with ENA to SS EIGHT MACHINES EACH The total cost of the LM s sprint package water injection skid or each The total cost of options chillers stacks cooling tower mod buildings etc or each Totals or each The transformers from ABB in Brazil should cost total in Brazil without shipping to the site Hope this helps you with the WLB bucket John

ENAESA LM Turbine Transfer Cc I would like to organize a sort of kickoff meeting of this group to briefly outline obligations and other terms conditions that would need to be included in an ENAESA commercial agreement and discuss steps that we need to take in the ENA WestLB facility to handle funding of some equipment configuration changesadditions that ESA would like for the earmarked machines I was hoping to find a time either Thursday tomorrow afternoon or Friday afternoon please let me know which time slots on these afternoons would not work for you and if you think that there are other individuals that would be essential to this meeting Thankyou Kevin Joyce x

Electrobolt SS Scope Cc Attached is the LM and options scope that ESA has prepared that will be input to our MOU It does not reflect the scope of equipment that will be procured from ABB yet this should be forthcoming Also below is the current cost estimate of the machines with their SS options and the ABB scope Please let us know what other information regarding scope that you might need Thanks Kevin Forwarded by Kevin JoyceCorpEnron on AM From John R Ayres on PM To Chris BoothENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Brett R nron Kevin nron Glauco nron Gerald L nron Subject Total Electrobolt SS Scope Chris attached is the total scope to SS From this list you should be able to make your change order to SS base on purchased quantities versus required quantities I have provided you the required quantities I provided you a column for the delta cost to SS When you are finished please complete the spreadsheet for all of our records I do not know how we are to add cost for storage either Thanks John From John R Ayres on PM To Kevin nron cc Brett R nron Subject SS GE Scope of Supply Cost Here are the total cost for the SS scope of supply for the Electrobolt Project I have not included any ENA burdens or storage cost These cost are from purchase order with ENA to SS EIGHT MACHINES EACH The total cost of the LM s sprint package water injection skid or each The total cost of options chillers stacks cooling tower mod buildings etc or each Totals or each The transformers from ABB in Brazil should cost total in Brazil without shipping to the site Hope this helps you with the WLB bucket John

ENAESA LM Turbine Transfer Cc I would like to organize a sort of kickoff meeting of this group to briefly outline obligations and other terms conditions that would need to be included in an ENAESA commercial agreement and discuss steps that we need to take in the ENA WestLB facility to handle funding of some equipment configuration changesadditions that ESA would like for the earmarked machines I was hoping to find a time either Thursday tomorrow afternoon or Friday afternoon please let me know which time slots on these afternoons would not work for you and if you think that there are other individuals that would be essential to this meeting Thankyou Kevin Joyce x
